item.description:
02-21: Weather Bulletin ---

If the weather looks iffy and you are still crazy enough to come (that will be me), please call the gym in advance to make sure they are open or are not closing early. I've e-mailed my mobile phone number to RSVP's of yes and maybe so if you join after tonight, drop me a note and I'll give you the number. Fingers are crossed the weather holds, I want to climb!!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Hi,

Let's climb on Friday just because we can. :o)

Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements. The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

If you have any questions, just drop me a note.

Hope to see some of you then,
Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal hanging out a picnic table in red pants and grey or white sweatshirt. If it's cold, I'll have a brown hat on.
item.name: 2-22 Climb at Everett
